column2: BRIEF-Cocrystal Pharma Says Terminated Amended, Restated Equity Distribution Agreement With A.G.P./Alliance Global Partners June 8 (Reuters) - Cocrystal Pharma Inc: * COCRYSTAL PHARMA INC - TERMINATED AMENDED, RESTATED EQUITY DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT WITH A.G.P./ALLIANCE GLOBAL PARTNERS Source: bit.ly/3cH6TQ5 Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Tonix Pharmaceuticals Enters Sales Agreement With A.G.P./Alliance Global Partners April 8 (Reuters) - Tonix Pharmaceuticals Holding Corp : * ENTERED INTO A SALES AGREEMENT WITH A.G.P./ALLIANCE GLOBAL PARTNERS * MAY OFFER AND SELL, FROM TIME TO TIME, THROUGH A.G.P. SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK Source text: (bit.ly/2VgevlM) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Global Partners To Buy Retail Fuel And Convenience Store Assets Of Champlain Oil May 17 (Reuters) - Global Partners LP: * GLOBAL PARTNERS TO ACQUIRE RETAIL FUEL AND JIFFY MART CONVENIENCE STORE ASSETS IN VERMONT AND NEW HAMPSHIRE FROM CHAMPLAIN OIL COMPANY * GLOBAL PARTNERS LP - EXPECT DEAL TO BE ACCRETIVE WITHIN FIRST FULL YEAR OF OPERATIONS * GLOBAL PARTNERS LP - DEAL INCLUDES FUEL SUPPLY AGREEMENTS FOR ABOUT 70 GAS STATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Global Partners Reports Q1 EPS $1.73 May 9 (Reuters) - Global Partners LP: * GLOBAL PARTNERS REPORTS FIRST-QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * GLOBAL PARTNERS LP Q1 SALES $2.8 BLN VS I/B/E/S VIEW $2.33 BLN * GLOBAL PARTNERS LP Q1 SHR VIEW $0.15 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * GLOBAL PARTNERS LP - FOR FULL-YEAR 2018, GLOBAL CONTINUES TO EXPECT TO GENERATE EBITDA OF $180 MLN TO $210 MLN * GLOBAL PARTNERS LP - FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR Q1 OF 2018 INCLUDE A ONE-TIME GAIN OF $52.6 MLN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
